description:
While Detective Li races to find the bomb before it goes off, Kindaichi goes back to the hotel to recreate the first murder. But how can one killer account for three murders when all of the main suspects have perfect alibis?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hong Kong Kowloon Zaihou Satsujin Jiken File. 3
L`affaire des meurtres du trésor de Kowloon à Hong Kong - Dossier 3
The Hong Kong Kowloon Treasure Murder Case, File 3
香港九龍財宝殺人事件 File.3
